description: Coefficients of the '3rd order' mock theta function rho(q)
references: Leila A. Dragonette, Some asymptotic formulae for the mock theta functions of Ramanujan, Trans. Amer. Math. Soc., 72 (1952) 474-500
Srinivasa Ramanujan, The Lost Notebook and Other Unpublished Papers, Narosa Publishing House, New Delhi, 1988, p. 15
George N. Watson, The final problem: an account of the mock theta functions, J. London Math. Soc., 11 (1936) 55-80
links: John F. R. Duncan, Michael J. Griffin and Ken Ono, Proof of the Umbral Moonshine Conjecture, arXiv:1503.01472, 2015
crossrefs: Other '3rd order' mock theta functions are at A000025, A053250, A053251, A053252, A053253, A053254.
author: _Dean Hickerson_, Dec 19 1999
